channel.title: Benchmark on violetear
channel.description: Recent content in Benchmark on violetear

item.title: The journey to achieve 0 allocations
item.description: Go is fast, but when doing things carefully, besides being faster is very light. violetear’s history is not very different from many others. It is an HTTP router capable of handling any requests. One of violetear’s main constraints is how to deal with static and dynamic URL’s. Let’s face it, if you want to replace an important component of your current architecture you should try to break as less as possible - highly trained monkeys hate changes.
